## ItemFieldDefinition type

Abstract base class for Item Field Definitions (specified in a Schema)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ItemFieldDefinition = {
    $type?: string;
    CustomUrl?: string;
    Description: string;
    ExtensionXml?: string;
    MaxOccurs: number;
    MinOccurs: number;
    Name: string;
};
```
